statements: SELECT * FROM game_schedule WHERE id = 1;
SELECT date, location, home_team, away_team FROM game_schedule WHERE result = 'Win';
SELECT location, date, home_team, away_team FROM game_schedule WHERE result = 'Loss' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT home_team, away_team, date, result FROM game_schedule WHERE location = 'Stadium A';
SELECT id, home_team, away_team, result FROM game_schedule WHERE date = '2022-01-01' AND location = 'Stadium B';
SELECT * FROM game_schedule WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT home_team, away_team, result FROM game_schedule ORDER BY result ASC;
SELECT location, date FROM game_schedule WHERE home_team LIKE 'P%' AND away_team LIKE 'M%' ORDER BY location, date;
SELECT id, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS scheduled_date, CONCAT(home_team, ' vs. ', away_team) AS match_info FROM game_schedule WHERE result IS NULL;
SELECT AVG(id) AS avg_id, MAX(id) AS max_id, MIN(id) AS min_id FROM game_schedule;
SELECT * FROM game_schedule;
SELECT game_date, location_id FROM game_schedule ORDER BY game_date DESC;
SELECT home_team_id, away_team_id FROM game_schedule WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT game_schedule.game_id, home_team_score, away_team_score FROM game_schedule JOIN game_result ON game_schedule.game_id = game_result.game_id;

SELECT game_date, home_team_id, away_team_id, winning_team_id FROM game_schedule JOIN game_result ON game_schedule.game_id = game_result.game_id WHERE winning_team_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY game_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_schedule WHERE game_id = 1;
SELECT game_id, game_date, location_id FROM game_schedule WHERE game_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM game_result WHERE home_team_score > 50 ORDER BY result_id DESC;

SELECT game_schedule.game_id, game_schedule.game_date, game_result.home_team_score, game_result.away_team_score FROM game_schedule INNER JOIN game_result ON game_schedule.game_id = game_result.game_id;

SELECT game_schedule.game_id, game_schedule.game_date, game_schedule.home_team_id, game_schedule.away_team_id, game_result.winning_team_id FROM game_schedule LEFT JOIN game_result ON game_schedule.game_id = game_result.game_id ORDER BY game_schedule.game_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM GameSchedule;
SELECT game_id, game_date, team1_name, team2_name FROM GameSchedule WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT game_id, game_date, team1_name, team2_name, location_id FROM GameSchedule ORDER BY game_date DESC;
SELECT game_id, team1_name, team2_name, location_id FROM GameSchedule WHERE game_date >= '2022-01-01' AND game_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT game_id, team1_name, team2_name, venue_name, city, state FROM GameSchedule INNER JOIN GameLocation ON GameSchedule.location_id = GameLocation.location_id;
SELECT * FROM GameSchedule ORDER BY game_date DESC, game_id ASC, location_id DESC;
SELECT team1_name, team2_name, game_date FROM GameSchedule WHERE game_date > '2021-01-01' AND game_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY game_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT team1_name, team2_name FROM GameSchedule WHERE team1_name != team2_name ORDER BY team1_name ASC;
SELECT venue_name, city, state FROM GameLocation WHERE state = 'California' ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT winning_team, losing_team, winning_score, losing_score FROM GameResults WHERE winning_score > losing_score ORDER BY winning_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_schedule ORDER BY game_date DESC;
SELECT game_id, location_id, home_team_id, away_team_id FROM game_schedule WHERE game_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE capacity > 5000;
SELECT team_id, team_name, coach_name, city FROM teams WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT game_id, winning_team_id, losing_team_id, winning_score, losing_score FROM game_results ORDER BY winning_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_schedule WHERE game_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT gs.game_date, l.location_name, t1.team_name AS home_team, t2.team_name AS away_team FROM game_schedule gs JOIN locations l ON gs.location_id = l.location_id JOIN teams t1 ON gs.home_team_id = t1.team_id JOIN teams t2 ON gs.away_team_id = t2.team_id;

SELECT tr.game_id, tr.winning_score, tr.losing_score, t1.team_name AS winning_team, t2.team_name AS losing_team FROM game_results tr JOIN teams t1 ON tr.winning_team_id = t1.team_id JOIN teams t2 ON tr.losing_team_id = t2.team_id WHERE tr.winning_score > 100;

SELECT gs.game_date, t1.team_name AS home_team, t2.team_name AS away_team FROM game_schedule gs JOIN teams t1 ON gs.home_team_id = t1.team_id JOIN teams t2 ON gs.away_team_id = t2.team_id WHERE gs.game_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT l.location_name, l.address, l.capacity, COUNT(gs.game_id) AS number_of_games FROM locations l LEFT JOIN game_schedule gs ON l.location_id = gs.location_id GROUP BY l.location_id;
SELECT * FROM GameSchedule;
SELECT game_id, game_date, location_id FROM GameSchedule WHERE game_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_name FROM Team ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT field_name, city, state FROM GameLocation WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM Player JOIN Team ON Player.team_id = Team.team_id;
SELECT * FROM GameSchedule ORDER BY game_date DESC;
SELECT game_date, location_id, home_team_id, away_team_id FROM GameSchedule WHERE game_date >= '2022-01-01' AND game_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT g.game_date, l.city, t.team_name FROM GameSchedule g JOIN GameLocation l ON g.location_id = l.location_id JOIN Team t ON g.home_team_id = t.team_id WHERE g.game_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY g.game_date ASC;

SELECT gs.game_date, ts1.team_name AS home_team, ts2.team_name AS away_team FROM GameSchedule gs INNER JOIN Team ts1 ON gs.home_team_id = ts1.team_id INNER JOIN Team ts2 ON gs.away_team_id = ts2.team_id WHERE gs.game_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT gs.game_date, l.city AS location_city, l.state AS location_state, tr.winning_score, tr.losing_score FROM GameSchedule gs JOIN GameLocation l ON gs.location_id = l.location_id JOIN GameResult tr ON gs.game_id = tr.game_id WHERE tr.winning_score > tr.losing_score ORDER BY gs.game_date ASC;
